mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_peed (project_num, project_member_num, project_peed_title, project_peed_content, project_peed_type, project_peed_start_period, project_peed_end_period, project_peed_charge, project_peed_priority, project_peed_regdate, project_peed_disclosure) VALUES (#{projectNum}, #{projectMemberNum}, #{projectPeedTitle}, #{projectPeedContent}, #{projectPeedType}, #{projectPeedStartPeriod}, #{projectPeedEndPeriod}, #{projectPeedCharge}, #{projectPeedPriority}, NOW(), #{projectPeedDisclosure})
mapper.select: SELECT pp.*, u.user_profile_picture AS writerProfile, d.department_name AS writerDepartment, u.user_name AS writerName, p.position_name AS writerPosition, uc.user_name AS chargerName, pc.position_name AS chargerPosition FROM project_peed AS pp LEFT JOIN user u ON pp.project_member_num = u.user_num LEFT JOIN user_positions p ON u.position_id = p.position_id LEFT JOIN user_departments d ON u.department_id = d.department_id LEFT JOIN user uc ON pp.project_peed_charge = uc.user_num LEFT JOIN user_positions pc ON uc.position_id = pc.position_id WHERE pp.project_num = #{projectNum} ORDER BY pp.project_peed_regdate desc
